entry.help_brief: component status {Enabled; Disabled}

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/in_directory
entry.label: Input directory:
entry.help_brief: input directory

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/out_directory
entry.label: Output directory:
entry.help_brief: output directory

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/site_prefix
entry.label: Site prefix:
entry.help_brief: file prefix for the study site

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/case_prefix
entry.label: Case prefix:
entry.help_brief: file prefix for the model scenario

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/n_steps
entry.label: Number of steps:
entry.help_brief: number of time steps

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/n_layers
entry.label: Number of soil layers:
entry.help_brief: number of soil layers

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/dt
entry.label: Time step:
entry.help_brief: timestep for infiltration process [sec]

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/Ks_type_0
entry.label: K_sat type:
entry.help_brief: allowed input types {Scalar; Grid; Time_Series; Grid_Sequence}

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/Ks_0
entry.label: K_sat:
entry.help_brief: sat. hydraulic conductivity [m/s]

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/Ki_type_0
entry.label: K_init type:
entry.help_brief: allowed input types {Scalar; Grid; Time_Series; Grid_Sequence}

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/Ki_0
entry.label: K_init:
entry.help_brief: init. hydraulic conductivity [m/s] (< K_sat)

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/qs_type_0
entry.label: theta_sat type:
entry.help_brief: allowed input types {Scalar; Grid; Time_Series; Grid_Sequence}

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/qs_0
entry.label: theta_sat:
entry.help_brief: sat. soil water content [none]

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/qi_type_0
entry.label: theta_init type:
entry.help_brief: allowed input types {Scalar; Grid; Time_Series; Grid_Sequence}

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/qi_0
entry.label: theta_init:
entry.help_brief: init. soil water content [none] (< theta_sat)

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/G_type_0
entry.label: G type:
entry.help_brief: allowed input types {Scalar; Grid; Time_Series; Grid_Sequence}

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/G_0
entry.label: G:
entry.help_brief: capillary length scale [m]

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/gam_type_0
entry.label: gamma type:
entry.help_brief: allowed input types {Scalar; Grid; Time_Series; Grid_Sequence}

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/gam_0
entry.label: gamma:
entry.help_brief: Smith-Parlange parameter [none]

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/soil_type_0
entry.label: Closest soil_type:
entry.help_brief: closest standard soil type {sand; loamy_sand; sandy_loam; silty_loam; loam; sandy_clay_loam; silty_clay_loam; clay_loam; sandy_clay; silty_clay; clay}

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/save_grid_dt
entry.label: Save grid timestep:
entry.help_brief: time interval between saved grids [sec]

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/SAVE_V0_GRIDS
entry.label: Save v0 grids toggle:
entry.help_brief: option to save grids of infil. rate (at surf) {Yes; No}

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/v0_gs_file
entry.label: Save v0 grids file:
entry.help_brief: filename for grid stack of v0 [m/s]

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/SAVE_I_GRIDS
entry.label: Save I grids toggle:
entry.help_brief: option to save grids of cumul. infil. depth {Yes; No}

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/I_gs_file
entry.label: Save I grids file:
entry.help_brief: filename for grid stack of I [m]

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/save_pixels_dt
entry.label: Save pixels timestep:
entry.help_brief: time interval between time series values [sec]

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/pixel_file
entry.label: Monitored pixel file:
entry.help_brief: filename for monitored pixel file

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/SAVE_V0_PIXELS
entry.label: Save v0 pixels toggle:
entry.help_brief: option to save time series of infil. rate (at surf) {Yes; No}

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/v0_ts_file
entry.label: Save v0 pixels file:
entry.help_brief: filename for time series of v0 [m/s]

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/SAVE_I_PIXELS
entry.label: Save I pixels toggle:
entry.help_brief: option to save time series of cumul. infil. depth {Yes; No}

entry.name: /InfilSmithParlange/Input/Var/I_ts_file
entry.label: Save I pixels file:
entry.help_brief: filename for time series of I [m]
